experience.title: experience
experience.description: I have over four years of professional experience as a Laravel Developer, currently working at TechAbbot. My role has allowed me to work on large-scale projects, focusing on backend development, RESTful API integration, and database optimization. I have contributed to building secure, scalable, and maintainable applications while collaborating closely with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality solutions.

hard-skills.title: hard-skills
hard-skills.description: My core technical expertise includes Laravel, PHP, MySQL, JavaScript, and Bootstrap, with a specialization in developing efficient backend systems and APIs. I also have hands-on experience with modern frontend frameworks like Nuxt.js and React, which allows me to work on full-stack solutions and deliver seamless user experiences. I am skilled in database design, query optimization, and implementing secure authentication mechanisms, as well as version control with Git and package/library development. Currently, I am expanding my knowledge by learning Rust, with the goal of building high-performance and memory-safe applications in the future.

soft-skills.title: soft-skills
soft-skills.description: Beyond my technical expertise, I bring strong problem-solving abilities, adaptability, and a commitment to continuous learning. I value teamwork and effective communication, which helps me collaborate productively with both developers and non-technical stakeholders. I am highly motivated, detail-oriented, and able to manage tasks independently while maintaining a focus on delivering impactful results.

bio.title: bio
bio.description:
About me
I am Nihir Zala, a passionate and self-driven individual with a strong interest in technology and creative problem-solving. I enjoy exploring how things work, learning new programming languages and frameworks, and constantly pushing myself to grow both personally and professionally. My approach is guided by curiosity, discipline, and a commitment to continuous improvement.

interests.title: interests
interests.description: Beyond development, I have a wide range of interests that keep me motivated and balanced. I enjoy participating in coding challenges, CTF competitions, and open-source contributions. In my free time, I like sports, gaming, music, and exploring new technologies like Rust, Nuxt, and React. These activities help me sharpen my skills, stay creative, and maintain a healthy work-life balance.

education.title: education
education.description: I completed my high school education with a strong foundation in science and mathematics, which sparked my interest in technology early on. I then pursued my university studies, where I specialized in Computer Application, gaining both theoretical knowledge and practical experience that prepared me for a career in software development.

sports.title: sports
sports.description: Sports keep me disciplined, competitive, and motivated. I regularly play cricket and football, which help me build teamwork skills and maintain a healthy lifestyle.

favorite-games.title: favorite-games
favorite-games.description: Gaming has always been one of my favorite pastimes as it helps me relax while also sharpening my focus and strategic thinking. I particularly enjoy playing battle royale and tactical shooters like PUBG/BGMI and Valorant, which test my teamwork and decision-making under pressure. I also like classic competitive games such as CS:GO for improving quick reflexes, and FIFA because football is just as exciting on the screen as it is on the field.
